thread.title: Ghana star Andre Ayew among TEN (10) favourites for African Player of the Year
thread.title_full: Ghana star Andre Ayew among TEN (10) favourites for African Player of the Year

title: Ghana star Andre Ayew among TEN (10) favourites for African Player of the Year
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 13:40 CET Ghana star Andre Ayew among TEN (10) favourites for African Player of the Year - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew 
CAF has announced the 37 nominees for this year’s African Player of the Year award - let’s have a look at the 10 favourites for the prize. 
Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure is once again among the favourites, having won the award for the past four years. If he defends his title, he would become the first player to lift the prize five times. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
